thread.section_title: Hotel Atmospheres - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Gem in the Quartier Latin
thread.title_full: Gem in the Quartier Latin - Review of Hotel Atmospheres, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Simon M
title: Gem in the Quartier Latin
text:
In thirty years of visiting the Quartier Latin, for its universities and grandes écoles (I am an academic) this is the best buy by quite some way. The historic building has been beautifully updated for today's discerning traveller. All aspects are very good. I particularly like the quiet location in the evening and night; high standard of comfort; free wifi; great buffet breakfast; value for money without compromising on highest standards; location location location!!!; attractiveness of the neighbourhood (clean, personal safety, light traffic); numerous places to eat within walking distance, all styles and price ranges; good for runners. I will be back here soon, third stay in just over a year
